Package main.java.logic.translation.cache

Class TranslationCache

java.lang.Object
main.java.logic.translation.cache.TranslationCache
public class TranslationCache extends Object
Builds and manages a database (SQLite) aimed at acting like a cachÃ© for requested and returned translations from the API, in order to alleviate API usage and speed up the execution of the program. This cachÃ© interacts with a very basic database, containing just one table, which stores the hashcode of a text to translate, language it has been translated to and its effective translation.
Version:
April 2024
Author:
Adriana R.F. (uo282798@uniovi.es)

  • Method Details

    • getUntranslated

      public Properties getUntranslated()
      Returns:
      set of properties that are not translated and thus, not found in the database

    • getTranslated

      public Properties getTranslated()
      Returns:
      set of properties (in a given language) that match those given as input and are found in the database

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the cache database (if existing).

    • storeAll

      public boolean storeAll(Properties results, Properties originals, String language)
      Stores all translations of the submitted textual queries, to their respective target language.
      Parameters:
      results - : all translations
      originals - : original, untranslated texts
      language - : alpha2 code of the target language
      Returns:
      boolean true if all results have been correctly stored

    • reset

      public void reset() throws SQLException
      Deletes all records from the database.
      Throws:
      SQL - exception
      SQLException

    • match

      public void match(Properties properties, String language) throws TranslationException
      Retrieves all present translations of a given set of properties into a language, that are in the database; and also those that are not cached.
      Parameters:
      properties - object containing set of translations to be fully computed or not
      language - alpha2 code of the language @ in case of error with database access, writing to/from...
      Throws:
      TranslationException
